abstract: Riding the Great Allegheny Passage, the author is glad to be outdoors as the colors change.
snippet: Riding the Great Allegheny Passage, the author is glad to be outdoors as the colors change.
lead_paragraph: CUMBERLAND, Md. -- One reason I began my cross-country bike trip in midsummer was so I could be on the road as the seasons changed. I had some chilly, autumnal weather before it was actually autumn, but the foliage has been slow to turn this year. It's only in the past week or so that the colors have taken on the burned yellows and burnished reds that we associate with fall, but I was lucky enough to be in the woods when it happened.

headline.main: A Burst of Autumn Color in the Great Allegheny Passage
